name: Create Payment Instrument With Invalid Type
descriptionHtml:
Request:

POST - http://44.228.71.230/v1/payment_instruments/create

raw 
  {
  "type": "CARDS",
  "association_name": "Visa",
  "holder_name": "Keith Wyman",
  "number": "4264281511112228",
  "expiration": {
    "month": "09",
    "year": "2025"
  },
  "security_code": "123",
  "billing": {
    "address": {
      "country_code": "US",
      "country_subdivision_code": "US-NY",
      "city": "New York",
      "postal_code": "33102",
      "line1": "382 NE 191st St"
    }
  }
}

Response:

400 - Bad Request 

  {"error":{"code":"VALIDATION_FAILED","details":[{"field":"type","code":"VALUE_INVALID","arguments":null,"developer_message":null}]}}
